General.Name: Seni Jaya Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Seni Jaya Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, provides media and production services for indoor and outdoor advertising in Malaysia. The company is involved in the rental of advertising display structures on prime outdoor locations; installation of display materials; and servicing and maintenance of signages and display materials. It also designs outdoors and indoor display structures; supplies advertising materials; and provides event and promotion services, as well as information technology services. Seni Jaya Corporation Berhad was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
